title: Britain and the Korean War
itunes:title: Britain and the Korean War
itunes:subtitle: Grace Huxford describes the key events of the Korean War and explains how it played out in Britain. Historyextra.com/podcas
description:
On the 70th anniversary of the outbreak of war on the Korean peninsula, historian Grace Huxford describes the key events of the conflict and explains how it played out in Britain. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
